rows.label: qst711402_msg0002
rows.name: One Bat Hinge and a Scarlet Coil...

rows.label: qst711402_msg0003
rows.name: I knew you'd pull through for me!

rows.label: qst711402_msg0004
rows.name:
The machine parts you can get in
Gula are a bit different to the ones
in Iira, aren't they?

rows.label: qst711402_msg0007
rows.name:
With your skills, you'll be able to
collect lots more parts than I ever
would.

rows.label: qst711402_msg0008
rows.name:
You might even be able to recover
some gold machine parts too. They'll
be more valuable.

rows.label: qst711402_msg0009
rows.name:
But to recover those parts, you'll
need a more efficient Seeker.
You'd better get to making one.

rows.label: qst711402_msg0010
rows.name:
OK, thank you!
You've brought me some nice parts!

rows.label: qst711402_msg0101
rows.name:
Huh? You've not got what you need
to make the Silver Seeker yet?

rows.label: qst711402_msg0102
rows.name:
Let me say it again, then. You'll need
the Krabble Carapaces that can be
found at the Serene Springside nearby.

rows.label: qst711402_msg0103
rows.name:
Incidentally, even with all the right
materials, you'll need someone who's
good at mechanics to make it!

rows.label: qst711402_msg0104
rows.name: Is there an Superbian in your group?

rows.label: qst711402_msg0105
rows.name:
Someone from Superbia should
know how to make one.

rows.label: qst711402_msg0106
rows.name:
Currently I'm searching for one
Bat Hinge and one Scarlet Coil.

rows.label: qst711402_msg0107
rows.name:
"Silver machine parts" tend to yield
a lot of them so keep a look out for
those.
